home_intro:
Discover your future with our online experts.
Receive clear, precise and personalized answers.
horoscope_subtitle: A symbolic vision of today's energy for every zodiac sign.
sign_aries_desc: Take initiative — momentum is working for you.
sign_taurus_desc: Strengthen your foundations and secure your projects.
sign_gemini_desc: Communicate — a key piece of information is coming.
sign_cancer_desc: Protect what matters and trust your intuition.
sign_leo_desc: Shine without fear — your efforts are finally noticed.
sign_virgo_desc: Clarify, organize — your mind becomes lighter.
sign_libra_desc: A new balance appears in your relationships.
sign_sagittarius_desc: Expand your horizons — a project grows bigger.
sign_aquarius_desc: Innovate — a different idea may change everything.
sign_pisces_desc: Listen to your feelings — a dream becomes a direction.
